trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00184_A1_000_2<tab>Tell me about the rank B elite mark. (Barbastelle)
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00184_A1_000_3<tab>Tell me about the rank A elite mark. (Unktehi)
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00184_A1_000_4<tab>Tell me about the rank S elite mark. (Croakadile)
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00184_MOBHUNTERS1F2_000_10<tab>What do I look like, a farmer? I'm a hunter, versed in the lore of elite marks.
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00184_MOBHUNTERS1F2_000_11<tab>You adventurers may think only of the Allied Seals given in reward, but there is poetry in the Hunt.

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00184_MOBHUNTERS1F2_000_12<tab>I will teach you the lore of the elite marks─it may yet persuade you to the beauty of the enterprise. At the very least, you shall die knowing more than you did.

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00184_MOBHUNTERS1F2_000_13<tab>Indeed, death is a distinct possibility. Elite marks are dangerous, so much so that they are ranked. “S” is the most dangerous rank, elusive and baneful.
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00184_MOBHUNTERS1F2_000_20<tab>“The vampire bat Barbastelle has many epithets, the only remotely flattering one being 'the laird of Blind Iron Mines.'

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00184_MOBHUNTERS1F2_000_21<tab>“While cattle mutilations are hardly any one creature's domain, experts are united in the view that the infamous mass draining of the herd at the Red Rooster Stead─the so-called 'Big Gulp'─is the work of Barbastelle.”

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00184_MOBHUNTERS1F2_000_30<tab>“Long have the superstitious coasters along Moraby Bay corrected their children with tales of Unktehi, the sea-dwelling eater of man-flesh.

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00184_MOBHUNTERS1F2_000_31<tab>“What was once considered a mere fancy of ignorant folk has proven disagreeably real, and Unktehi's excursions onto land have left the population fearful─and fewer.”

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00184_MOBHUNTERS1F2_000_40<tab>“Frogs of inconvenient size are legion, but surprisingly few of them seek fodder commensurate with their size. The Croakadile is one such unwelcome surprise.

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00184_MOBHUNTERS1F2_000_41<tab>“The first known victim during the present manifestation is reported to be a franklin who felt his ring slip off during a nightly walk with his lady.

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00184_MOBHUNTERS1F2_000_42<tab>“He turned back down the path, and his lady saw him reach down just as the moon took cover behind a cloud. When the moonlight returned, he had vanished.”
